author: badguy_op
content: Will be there limited nodes to run eth 2.0

author: sky.cactus
content: Ethereum will remain censorship resistant with the addition of Proof of Stake.  Anyone who can afford the stake, can participate and run a staking setup and anyone whose machine is good enough can run a fully validating set of clients.

author: vivian1463
content: Sharding is going to make it easier to run a node anyway so the barrier to entry would be lowered even more for a staking setup
